title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 March 2009 - XWiki
content: xwikibot - (03/03/2009 03:05): XWiki.LeeEleven was modified by XWiki.LeeEleven (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/LeeEleven xwikibot - (03/03/2009 03:06): XWiki.LeeEleven was modified by XWiki.LeeEleven (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/LeeEleven xwikibot - (03/03/2009 03:13): XWiki.LeeEleven was modified by XWiki.LeeEleven - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/LeeEleven xwikibot - (03/03/2009 03:15): XWiki.LeeEleven was modified by XWiki.LeeEleven - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/LeeEleven xwikibot - (03/03/2009 05:18): XWiki.depaul was modified by XWiki.depaul (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/depaul xwikibot - (03/03/2009 05:19): XWiki.depaul was modified by XWiki.depaul - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/depaul xwikibot - (03/03/2009 05:19): XWiki.depaul was modified by XWiki.depaul - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/depaul xwikibot - (03/03/2009 05:20): XWiki.depaul was modified by XWiki.depaul (Upload new image chelsea-fc-england.jpg) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/depaul Denis - (03/03/2009 09:47): jvelociter: Hello, have you catched why it has broken the way AdminSheet works ? jvelociter - (03/03/2009 09:49): Hi Denis . Not really, I just understand that $doc is the AdminSheet document context instead of the XWiki.Import one jvelociter - (03/03/2009 09:49): I think it's a hard one to cleanly fix :) several devs lost teeths trying :D jvelociter - (03/03/2009 09:50): I reverted Vincent's commit (the first one you proposed on JIRA) and applied the later one instead Denis - (03/03/2009 10:11): jvelociter: yes, but at the same time, the patch proposed by vmassol was a better coding practice, and we do not know where was the real issue behind that and this will lead for sure to a return of the bug later, even in another application than the admin one. jvelociter - (03/03/2009 10:12): Denis: yes I agree, this is something that ultimetaly we'll have to solve jvelociter - (03/03/2009 10:12): but Vincent commit broke a feature jvelociter - (03/03/2009 10:13): we have to commit it when we are sure we do not break something else Denis - (03/03/2009 10:13): jvelociter: may be you have to left an open issue in JIRA to followup on this jvelociter - (03/03/2009 10:13): I think we have one already jvelociter - (03/03/2009 10:13): let me check Denis - (03/03/2009 10:14): jvelociter: which one ?
